name: Core Lightbox Gallery
description: This plugin provides a fully-featured engine for displaying Publii galleries, utilizing the PhotoSwipe library to enhance the rendering of the native gallery markup
author: TidyCustoms

config.name: initialZoomLevel
config.label: Default zoom level on open
config.note: Set the zoom level applied when the lightbox first opens.

config.name: secondaryZoomLevel
config.label: Zoom level for interactive actions
config.note: Set the zoom level applied when interacting with an already opened image in the lightbox, such as double-tap or zoom button actions. A value of 1 means 'fill', where the image cover the entire viewport.

config.name: spacing
config.label: Slide spacing
config.note: Set the spacing between slides as a ratio relative to the viewport width (e.g., 0.1 = 10%).

config.name: padding
config.label: Slide padding
config.note: Define the padding around slides without units. The script will automatically interpret values as pixels. Example: top: 20, bottom: 40, left: 100, right: 100.

config.name: separator
config.note: Configure options related to the lightbox interface, including actions for images and controls visible when an image is already opened in the lightbox.

config.name: imageClickAction
config.label: Image click action
config.note:
'Zoom or close' - image will be closed if it cannot be zoomed (default imageClickAction).
'Zoom' - zooms current image (depending on 'Zoom level for interactive actions' - default doubleTapAction).

config.name: loop
config.label: Loop through slides
config.note: Allow navigation from the last slide to the first and vice versa.

config.name: wheelToZoom
config.label: Enable wheel to zoom
config.note: Allow zooming with the mouse wheel without holding the control key.

config.name: escKey
config.label: Enable ESC key
config.note: Allow closing the lightbox with the ESC key.

config.name: arrowKeys
config.label: Enable keyboard navigation
config.note: Allow navigation with the left/right arrow keys.

config.name: bgColor
config.label: Overlay color
config.note: Set the backdrop color for the overlay. Do not use RGBA for transparent backgrounds as it affects performance. Use the option below instead.

config.name: bgColorOpacity
config.label: Overlay opacity
config.note: Set the opacity level for the overlay color.

config.name: placeholderBgColor
config.label: Image placeholder  color
config.note: Set the background color for image placeholders displayed while images are loading.

config.name: uiBgColor
config.label: UI background color
config.note: Set the background color for UI elements, such as icons, buttons, and toolbars.

config.name: uiElementsColor
config.label: UI elements color
config.note: Set the color for UI elements, such as icons and caption text

config.name: iconSet
config.label: Icon set
config.note: Choose a predefined set of icons or select 'Custom' to define your own.

config.name: separator
config.note: Configure options related to the lightbox interface, including actions for images and controls visible when an image is already opened in the lightbox.

config.name: downloadSVG
config.label: Download button
config.note: Define the SVG for the 'download' button by pasting your SVG code here. Please ensure that the SVG uses 'stroke' instead of 'fill' for coloring, as the color options apply to 'stroke'. Set 'fill' to 'none' to ensure proper styling.

config.name: arrowPrevSVG
config.label: Previous / Next buttons
config.note: Define the SVG for the 'previous arrow' button by pasting your SVG code here. The 'next arrow' icon will be automatically generated based on this icon.

config.name: closeSVG
config.label: Close button
config.note: Define the SVG for the 'close' button by pasting your SVG code here.

config.name: zoomSVG
config.label: Zoom button
config.note: Define the SVG for the 'zoom-out' button by pasting your SVG code here.

config.name: iconStrokeWidth
config.label: Icon stroke width
config.note: Define the stroke width for icons in pixels.

config.name: iconSize
config.label: Icon size
config.note: Define the icon size (width and height) in pixels.

config.name: transitionEffect
config.label: Transition effect
config.note: Choose the animation effect for opening and closing the lightbox.

config.name: showAnimationDuration
config.label: Show animation duration (ms)
config.note: Set the duration of the opening animation in milliseconds.

config.name: hideAnimationDuration
config.label: Hide animation duration (ms)
config.note: Set the duration of the closing animation in milliseconds.

config.name: easing
config.label: Animation timing curve
config.note: Define the curve that controls the animation speed over time (CSS timing-function, e.g., ease, linear, cubic-bezier).
